title: Brighter Minds Bob the Builder Can-Do Zoo [Old Version]
description: The delivery train has come to town, dropping off all the animals for the Bobland Bay Zoo. Unfortunately, there is no Bobland Bay Zoo! Monkeys have moved into the shool playground, alligators are in the swimming pool, and the lion has taken over the Mayor's office! Work double-time with Bob and his can-do crew to get the zoo built and make homes for all the animals. Requirements MAC OS X 10.2 or newer Windows XP, Vista Pentium III 500 MHz or faster 128 MB free RAM.
